text.div:
Mapping from EmailSoortCodelijst to ContactPointSystem

ACTIVE. Published on 2024-04-09 16:00:20+0200 by HL7 Netherlands (Nictiz: info@nictiz.nl).

Maps EmailAddressType codes as found in HCIM ContactInformation (release 2017) to ContactPoint.system codes as found in FHIR STU3


Group 1 Mapping from v3 Code System AddressUse to ContactPointSystem

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HP (primary home)is related toemailHP: Primary home/privé emailadres. email: The value is an email address. Use in conjunction with ContactPoint.use = home.
WP (work place)is related toemailWP: work place/zakelijk emailadres. email: The value is an email address. Use in conjunction with ContactPoint.use = work.

name: EmailSoortCodelijst-to-ContactPointSystem
description: Maps EmailAddressType codes as found in HCIM ContactInformation (release 2017) to ContactPoint.system codes as found in FHIR STU3

target.comment: HP: Primary home/privé emailadres. email: The value is an email address. Use in conjunction with ContactPoint.use = home.
WP: work place/zakelijk emailadres. email: The value is an email address. Use in conjunction with ContactPoint.use = work.
